identity.name: Lumina Auto Detailing
principles: Fusion over Imitation: Mix Automotive Industrial with Cyberpunk Aesthetics
Emotion First: Every interaction feels like a gear shift - precise and satisfying
Content is King: The car is the hero. Dark backgrounds make the gloss pop
Negative Space: Luxury is space. Don't crowd the UI

headings.usage: Use for all section headers, hero text, and major calls to action. Letter spacing -0.02em.

body.usage: Use for all paragraphs, UI elements, and data tables.

layout.spacing_scale: Generous. Use p-8 to p-12 for section padding.

grid_systems.marketing: Bento Grid (Tetris Mode). Mix col-span-2 and col-span-1 cards.
grid_systems.dashboard: Control Room Grid. Dense, data-focused, 100% width utilization.

containers.glass_card: backdrop-blur-xl bg-black/40 border border-white/10 rounded-xl shadow-2xl

visual_enhancers.noise: Add a fixed position div with a noise texture opacity-5 pointer-events-none z-50 mix-blend-overlay
visual_enhancers.glows: Use colored blobs (blue/purple) with blur-3xl opacity-20 behind key elements

instructions_to_main_agent: CRITICAL: The project uses .js/.jsx files. DO NOT create .ts/.tsx files.
CRITICAL: Remove any default React logos or 'App.css' centering.
STEP 2: Update index.css to include the Unbounded and Manrope fonts.
STEP 3: Create a 'Layout' component that enforces the Dark Mode background #09090b.
STEP 4: Build the Landing Page using the 'Bento Grid' layout for services.
STEP 5: Build the Booking Form using a multi-step wizard inside a 'Glass Card'.
STEP 6: Build the Admin Dashboard using the 'Control Room' density.
NOTE: For the 'Plastic Revitalization' service, use the 'revitalization' image provided.
NOTE: Ensure all text has sufficient contrast against the dark background (use text-zinc-100 and text-zinc-400).
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Do not use gradients for text unless it's a very large headline.
Always add data-testid to interactive elements.
Never use pure black #000000. Use #09090b or #18181b.
